title: Ethereum Merge: How one big cryptocurrency is going green
description: Ethereum, which currently uses as much energy as a medium-sized country, is to halt cryptomining.

title: Google faces €25bn legal action in UK and the EU
description: Publishers should be compensated over Google's 'anti-competitive' digital ad practices, say lawyers.

title: Twitter misleading the public, whistleblower says
description: Twitter's former head of security Peiter Zatko has been giving evidence to US lawmakers.
